description.value: All blights can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dominate] as an innate primal spell but can target only animals, beasts, fungi, oozes, or plants that are located inside their cursed domain. If a creature dominated by this spell leaves the cursed domain, the effects of dominate immediately end, but as long as the dominated creature remains in the cursed domain, the duration is unlimited. When a blight targets a mindless fungi, ooze, or plant, its dominate spell loses the mental trait.

publication.title: Pathfinder #211: The Secret of Deathstalk Tower
